title: Sustainable release of Mg(NO3)2 from a separator boosts the electrochemical performance of lithium metal as an anode for secondary batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5461-5467
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01426J, Paper
Shuang Xia, Zhifeng Lin, Bohao Peng, Xuelong Yuan, Jingzhen Du, Xinhai Yuan, Lili Liu, Lijun Fu, Rudolf Holze, Yuping Wu
A separator, which can sustainably release Mg(NO3)2 into the electrolyte to ensure dendrite-free and long cycling of lithium metal batteries, is reported. This method is simple and efficient.
